channel.title: Health problem
channel.description: I am having a problem, that when you first start, you have 98/10 health, and sometimes when npcs die, they go back to full health again. How could I fix this?

item.title: Health problem
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

The 98/10 was originally put in there so players could train with hp I think. You can remove it by looking in the player.java. Just search for for (int i = 0; i < playerLevel.length; i++) { or something of that sort and the code for making it 98 should be right below it. As for the hp problem with the npcs, that’s because the npc’s hp level was set to an extremely high number in the npc.cfg. A player will attack it until the bar above its head turns completely red, then the bar will just reset and go back up to full, but the hp itself isn’t restoring. You can edit the npc’s hp in the npc.cfg file.

Read full topic

item.title: Health problem
item.dc:creator: @daygen4545 daygen4545
item.description:
@daygen4545 wrote:

How fast the npc respawns? I’m pretty sure it only does this sometimes, and they don’t drop when this happens.

Read full topic

item.title: Health problem
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

The npc’s health doesn’t restore, it’s just how fast the npc respawns, secondly for your health go into client.java and search for something you start of with and hopefully it should say something like: addSkillXP(13999599,4) or something like that, if so delete it.

Read full topic
